extension.summary: HTML/XML parser for quick-turnaround applications like screen-scraping
extension.description: Beautiful Soup parses arbitrarily invalid SGML and provides a variety of methods and Pythonic idioms for iterating and searching the parse tree.
A small plugin for playing reddit acestreams

extension.summary: Wtyczka wideo do Real-Debrid.com Podziękowania dla u/p1c2u i u/Darreen
extension.description: Explore and stream your downloads folder on real-debrid.com -- works on Xbox ONE - Kodi 18
Przeglądaj i odtwarzaj swoje pliki z real-debrid.com -- działa na XBOX ONE - Kodi 18
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.news: v1.0.00 (02-2018) - Dodanie funkcji usuwania plików oraz torrentów / Add delete option for files and torrents - Wtyczka działa na Kodi 18 na Xbox ONE / Addon works on Kodi 18 on Xbox ONE - Migracja z TVA URLResolver do ResolveURL od Jsergios / Moved Away from TVA URLResolver to Jsergios ResolveURL - Usunięcie URLResolver z repozytorium / Removed URLResolver from Repo

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
Επίλυση συνδέσμων κοινών εξυπηρετητών σε μορφή βίντεο ικανό για αναπαραγωγή στο XBMC/Kodi.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
Scrape common video host for URL's to be playable in Kodi, simplifying addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. extension.summary: [B][COLOR red]Venom[/COLOR][/B] - We do not host any of the contents streamed
extension.description: [B]Venom[/B][CR] This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels.[CR]The author does not host any of the content in this addon and takes no responsibility for content found.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!
extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v3.5.2 - Feb. 22, 2020[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Trailer module updated with new api keys to fix google search of youtube for trailers[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Changed how restarting a previousely watched movie or episode is handled. Previousely the title would be marked unwatched upon replaying a previousely watched item. Now the watched indicator is not changed.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added ability to pass to skin resume points. This now allows for skin to use a watched progress indicator.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added TMDB Box Office to Movie Menu and setting page option to remove item from navigation.[/I]

extension.description: Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

Plexus - Una estructura compleja conteniendo una intrincada red de partes. Plexus añade soporte nativo peer-to-peer (AceStream y SopCast) al Centro de Entretenimiento Kodi para varias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentacion: (falta)
